nl.tno.stormcv.fetcher

Class ImageFetcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tno.stormcv.fetcher.ImageFetcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, IFetcher<Frame>

    public class ImageFetcher
extends Object
implements IFetcher<Frame>
    A IFetcher implementation that reads images and emits them into the topology as Frame objects. The ImageFetcher works in the same way as the FileFrameFetcher; it expands locations it gets looking for image files, spreads all images among all ImageFetcher instances within the topology and starts processing them.
    Author:
    Corne Versloot
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
